answers.answer: I think its a perfect time. :) expecailly if your trying to beat the holidays and another thing is you can see wat all you get at the shower and have extra time to get the rest of the things: )
It's 100% up to up you. I think its fine.
Thanks just don't wanna have it too soon. Seems like this pregnancy is flying by.
I'm having to have my shower early due to family schedule conflicts. It's on October 19th and I'll only be 26 +6. I think it just depends on your situation.

question: I am 21 weeks tomorrow and I was planning on doing my baby shower October 25th. That way itis before all the holidays. I am due January 6th but i am having a c - section due to prior one and they think I am developing preeclampsia. So is two months before too soon or is that good?
title: 29 weeks too early for a baby shower?
